The World Bank's President, Jim Yong Kim, has warned the US that it is days away from causing a global economic disaster unless politicians come up with a plan to raise the nation's debt limit. Failure to do so could result in interest rate increases, a declining stock market, and slowed growth, which would greatly hurt developed economies. Kim's statement underscores the seriousness of the situation

Manchester City is the best-paid sports team in the world with an average first-team pay of £5.3m a year, or £102,653 per week. Five Premier League sides make the top 20 on the list, with Liverpool in 20th place with an average of £3.4m per man per year.<eos>

Summary:

Iran claimed to shoot down a U.S. drone in eastern Iran, while NATO's International Security Assistance Force said a U.S. unarmed reconnaissance aircraft was flying over western Afghanistan and lost control. A U.S. official with knowledge of the incident said the crew operating the unmanned drone reported a loss of flight control just before the drone went down.
